name: Dawn of the killer zombies
description:
A couple of years ago a new unknown virus has crippled the civilization due to a failed experiment. You are the last remaining human in the town. There is no help from anyone, you can count only on yourself. You are alone with 3 types of weapons , try to survive and kill as many zombies as you can!Single player mode


The current features include:
  • Multiplayer mode
  • Gorgeous graphics
  • Available on windows, mac
  • Dynamic environments
  • Lot of zombies
